description: {"blocks":[{"key":"82ajm","text":"This protocol describes a semi-customized workflow to perform water restriction with mice designated for future experiments. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1sm2h","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"66d4b","text":"Water restriction is a common method used to increase engagement and motivation of mice performing behavioral experiments that use water as a reward.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"668q6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2jbo2","text":"Water restriction timeline summary: Mice should have three daily weights collected, which are averaged to determine their baseline weight. The target weight will be a percentage (desired) of their baseline weight. The first day of water restriction begins on the last day of the mouses weight collection and is given 1.0mL of water. The mouse should be weighed and provided at least 1.0mL of water daily while under water restriction. All calculations should be individually determined for each mouse. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":35}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3c828","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eeita","text":"Mice under water restriction should be closely monitored for health concerns due to the effects of dehydration. All mice should receive 1.0mL of water daily. Follow IACUC and veterinary requirements for water restricting mice. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5ampj","text":"Allow the mouse to drink it's alloted water amount, and then remove water dish from cage.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ai6e0","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a3s67","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"dh9d4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"3d6b3","text":"This ensures that that mouse has received it's daily water and is given some time to remember about the lickspouts on the non-water restriction rack.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4ruso","text":"Record on horizontal animal cage card that animal has been placed on adlib water. Include the date.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a9tf6","text":"Retrieve the \"placed back on adlib\" cage flag and place on cage over cage cards. Write the date.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ratr","text":"Place mouse on non-water restriction rack with water spouts and/or attach a filled water bottle to cage.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4o6va","text":"Collect and record daily weight of mouse on ad-lib water for at least 3 days.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4m6uv","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5p3g4","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"534up","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"d5b8h","text":"Begin collecting weights on the Wednesday prior to habituation (assuming a weekday schedule).","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}
